item.title: Bayesian Networks
item.description: We will discuss two papers introducing the concepts of Bayesian networks: “Bayesian Networks” (Pearl and Russell, 2000) and “Local Computations with Probabilities on Graphical Structures and Their Application to Expert Systems” (Lauritzen and Spiegelhalter, 1988)

item.title: Causal Inference Introduction
item.description: We will discuss two papers introducing overviews of the concepts of causal inference: “Causal diagrams for empirical research” (Pearl, 1995) and “Causal Inference Using Potential Outcomes: Design, Modeling, Decisions” (Rubin, 2005)

item.title: "Why Should I Trust You?" Explaining the Predictions of Any Classifier
item.description: We will discuss the paper from Ribeiro et. al. (2016) titled “Why Should I Trust You?” Explaining the Predictions of Any Classifier.

item.title: Representer Point Selection for Explaining Deep Neural Networks (Cont'd)
item.description: We will continue to discuss the paper from Yeh et. al. (2018) titled “Representer Point Selection for Explaining Deep Neural Networks”.

item.title: Representer Point Selection for Explaining Deep Neural Networks
item.description: We will discuss the paper from Yeh et. al. (2018) titled “Representer Point Selection for Explaining Deep Neural Networks”.

item.title: Welcome to DSSl @ CSU
item.description: To kick off the journal club, we will have a brief discussion of potential topics for the semester.
topics Weekly topics for Data Science and Statistical Learning Journal Club @ CSU

item.title: About
item.description: The Data Science and Statistical Learning Journal Club @ CSU meets weekly to discuss papers and current work on topics relevent to data science and statistical learning.
